title: Pride Be Damned
description: Fifteen-year-old Toby Garrison is still reeling from the death of his mom.  Now his dad is missing, and the local sheriff refuses to help find him. So, Toby vows to find his father on his own.  A short time later, local thugs break into his house and put a beating on him! Toby is scared and alone.  Then the special forces uncle he hasnâ€™t seen in years shows up out of the blue to offer his assistance.  Can Toby trust him? More importantly, can he afford not to?
author: Michael Terence Publishing
